channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 04:15 WARNING !!! DONE ALREADY OF USEED AVIRTED AVIRT Bombs (Kabiv).
item.description: 🟢 04:15 WARNING !!! DONE ALREADY OF USEED AVIRTED AVIRT Bombs (Kabiv). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 04:14 Dumping anxiety in Kryvyi Rih District. Stop after further messages.
item.description: 🟢 04:14 Dumping anxiety in Kryvyi Rih District. Stop after further messages.#Kryvyi Rih. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 04:14 Drawing on anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kryvyi Rih rayonolnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community
item.description: 🟡 04:14 Drawing on anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Kryvyi Rih rayonolnikovsky district- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
